data: If you follow these instructions, do you return to the starting point? Always face forward. Take 9 steps left. Take 10 steps forward. Take 9 steps right. Take 10 steps backward. Options: - Yes - No Let’ s think step by step.
First, you'll start facing forward. There are always first places to begin. The first place to start is facing forward. So, the answer is no.

The number of steps needed to get back to the starting point is 7 steps backward + seven steps right + 10 steps left equals 17. If you are going to do the same thing in reverse, you take backwards steps. So, the answer is No.
